SELECT dp."uuid" AS "uuid", ds."name" AS "deptSub", dp."diagnosis" AS "diagnosis", dp."rp" AS "rp", pc."name" AS "patientName", pc."sex" AS "patientSex", TO_CHAR(pc."birthday", 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS "patientBirthday", d."name" AS "doctorName" FROM HOSPITAL.DOCTOR_PRESCRIPTION dp JOIN HOSPITAL.DOCTOR d ON d."id"=dp."doctor_id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD pc ON pc."id"=dp."patient_card_id" JOIN HOSPITAL.MEDICAL_DEPT_SUB ds ON ds."id"=dp."sub_dept_id" JOIN HOSPITAL.PATIENT_USER_INFO_CARD c ON c."id"=dp."patient_card_id" WHERE dp."registration_id" = ${registrationId}
AND c."user_id" = ${userId}
